long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jairo - Automate LinkedIn Referral Requests for Job Hunting
Jairo simplifies your job search by automating referral requests on LinkedIn. Just include the job link while sending a connection request, and let Jairo handle the rest. The extension tracks accepted connection requests and sends personalized referral requests automatically—no need to manually track who you contacted for which company. Save time, stay organized, and boost your chances of landing your dream job.

Efficient, smart, and hassle-free—Jairo is the ultimate LinkedIn automation tool for job seekers!
